98 Godzilla is one of my favorite pieces of schlock film making. For me its right up there with Plan 9 from outer space for movies I will happily watch just for the giggles, though it perhaps lacks the heart of Plan 9.

"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/538407e5636872622e980500#post_538407e5636872622e980500
At this point I have no interest in seeing that movie at all, and this only buries my interest further. Also fuck you David Goyer, She Hulk is one of my favorite books.

"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53840d236368724eef7a0000#post_53840d236368724eef7a0000
The sad part is I really, really want a Wonder Woman movie and not only are the odds against me ever seeing one, if it did exist it would probably be more about some sort of idiot bullshit regarding the amazons instead of the crazy shit that makes me love Wondy.

Here is something that happened in Gail Simone's excellent run on Wonder Woman: She decapitated Satan with the invisible jet.

topics.body:
One person suggested that Asylum should make a film called _Attack of the Tyrannotatoes_. Some scientists want to clone a tyrannosaur, but the DNA is incomplete, so they fill in the gaps with potato DNA. The seeds are then mistakenly sent to farmers across America, and farmers start getting killed. The protagonists now have to kill the tyrannotatoes. 

To me, that sounds like the most unintentionally hilarious anti-GMO propaganda ever.
topics.author: 50b70eeb7f123b1a02000097
